TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XmlDictionaryWriter extends System.Xml.XmlWriter

remarks.para: You can derive from this class to do other functions than serialization.
Note that there is a known issue with the normalization of linefeed characters inside of CDATA sections that you may encounter.

summary.para: Represents an abstract class that indigo1 derives from to do serialization and deserialization.

MemberSignature.Value: protected XmlDictionaryWriter ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

remarks.para: Invoked only by its derived classes because this class is abstract.

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool CanCanonicalize { get; }
.property instance bool CanCanonicalize

remarks.para: Returns true if and only if this derived class of can canonicalize the XML content being written to it, according to the Exclusive XML Canonicalization rules as defined in Exclusive XML Canonicalization Version 1.0.

summary.para: This property always returns false. Its derived classes can override to return true if they support canonicalization.

remarks.para: If the namespace maps to the current default namespace, no prefix is generated.
When writing attribute values, this method generates a prefix if the namespace is not found. When writing element content, it throws an exception if the namespace is not found.

summary.para: Writes out the namespace-qualified name. This method looks up the prefix that is in scope for the given namespace.

Docs.param: The local name of the qualified name.
The namespace URI of the qualified name.
